timeline.bodyText: why not assign it false here, rather than the check again on L101
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Service endpoint takes Boolean.   It should be leave as Boolean so we leave to service to decide true/false to use as default value.  For the L101,  it should change to use Boolean as well. I will update it in the Analyze PR
replies.author: mssfang
